name: JDE - Shenanijam Bundle
description:
Check out some awesome games from students at DePaul University! The JDE hosted a 48 hour work space for everyone of all experiences to participate. The event ranged from students from freshmen to masters & alumni. Some made mini games while others asset packs for the Shenanijam 2018. Be sure to check out our projects below!

GAME JAM THEMES

Voided Sandwich | Sticky Justice | Burn it Down

CREDITS
